BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: Resolution supporting S.201, also known as the “9/11 Heroes Health Improvement Act of 2007”, to establish a grant program for individuals still suffering ill health effects as a result of the September 11, 2001 attacks on the World Trade Center and the Pentagon.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend the Volunteer Ambulance Workers’ Benefit Law to include volunteer ambulance workers who render aid at the request of the City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Volunteer Ambulance Workers’ Benefit Law to include volunteer ambulance workers who render aid at the request of the City.

Items.Title: Resolution supporting S.201, also known as the “9/11 Heroes Health Improvement Act of 2007”, to establish a grant program for individuals still suffering ill health effects as a result of the September 11, 2001 attacks on the World Trade Center and the Pentagon.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend the Volunteer Ambulance Workers’ Benefit Law to include volunteer ambulance workers who render aid at the request of the City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Volunteer Ambulance Workers’ Benefit Law to include volunteer ambulance workers who render aid at the request of the City.
